version_description:
• Accédez rapidement à vos comptes avec l’identification par empreinte digitale TouchID.
• Consultez et gérez facilement vos virements.
• Gérez vos destinataires de virements InteracMD et BNC.
• Simulez différents scénarios et voyez comment optimiser vos paiements hypothécaires et réaliser des économies.
• Corrections et améliorations diverses

Optimizations
An easier-to use app with improvements and bug-fixes for a simplified experience.
- Bug-fix related to fingerprint sign in
- Bug-fix related to loss of digital fingerprints
- New sign in available for iOS 9.3.5
- Possibility of quickly switching between accounts on tablet

Details of your payments
You can now see the vendor’s name in your list of transactions.

Improvements
Bug fixes and improvements have been made to optimize your experience.

Better performance
Bug fixes and improvements have been made to increase the loading speed of your mobile app.

New for retail clients only

Interac e-Transfer service fees are now included in your package.
National Bank has simplified its offer from 16 to 4 banking packages. Discover them today on nbc.ca.

Connect Easily
Use your email to sign into your account. It’s simple and secure.

Pay Quickly
Use your cell to pay with Apple Pay™.

Transfer Effortlessly
Send money in a blink with Interac e Transfer®.

Notify your travel
Advise us of your next trip and use your credit cards worry-free.

Improvements
Bug fixes and improvements have been made to optimize your experience.

- Addition of signs +/- in front of transaction amounts
- Update of menu and action bar options
- Correction of inaccurate or duplicated mortgage balances
- Improved sign-in process
- Addition of special characters (including hyphens) for Interac e-Transfers
- Correction of erroneous amounts for Interac e-Transfer cancellations

Improvements
Bug fixes and improvements have been made to optimize your experience.

- Addition of signs +/- in front of transaction amounts
- Update of menu and action bar options
- Correction of inaccurate or duplicated mortgage balances
- Improved sign-in process
- Addition of special characters (including hyphens) for Interac e-Transfers
- Correction of erroneous amounts for Interac e-Transfer cancellations

Optimizations
- An easier-to use application with improvements and bug-fixes for a simplified experience
- Removed the empty window that appeared randomly
- Added a notification when you accidentally pay the same bill twice
- Updated appearance and design for certain app pages
- Added +/- in front of amounts for lines of credit
- Adjusted the amount displayed when you swipe to view your credit card details

Optimizations
- Bug fixes when receiving Interac e-Transfers
- Other bug fixes and performance enhancements

We are continually optimizing our application to simplify it and better meet your needs. Our latest optimizations include:
- Adding the total amount of investments to the overview
- Contributing to an RRSP
- Fixing a bug related to the display of the sign-in page on some devices
- Other improvements and bug fixes

We are continually optimizing our application to simplify it and better meet your needs. Our latest optimizations include:
- The option to pay the total balance on your National Bank credit card
- Fixing a bug that prevented the sign-in email from being entered
- Fixing a bug with the Pay with my points feature
- Other improvements and bug fixes
Improvements and bug fixes

We are continually optimizing our application to simplify it and better meet your needs. Our latest optimizations include:
- The possibility for co-holders of an account to download a specimen cheque
- Signing up for a banking package or changing your package
- Optimizing investment account details
- Optimizing the receipt of an Interac e-Transfer®
- Fixing a bug that prevented some users from signing in

- Activating your credit card online
- A bug fix related to upcoming payments that were paid immediately as well as other improvements
- Other improvements and bug fixes

- Replacing or temporarily locking your credit card online
- An improved experience if you forget your password, enabling you to change it no matter what type of product you hold
- Real-time display of your transactions
- Other improvements and bug fixes
